name: XMLExportMaps

properties.name: length
properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.

parameters.name: mappedStyle
parameters.description: The mapped style. Can accept: ParagraphStyle, CharacterStyle, TableStyle, CellStyle or String.

parameters.name: markupTag
parameters.description: The tag to map. Can accept: XMLTag or String.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new XMLExportMap (Optional)

methods.name: count
methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the XMLExportMap.

methods.name: item
methods.description: Returns the XMLExportMap with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

methods.name: itemByRange
methods.description: Returns the XMLExportMaps within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The XMLExportMap, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: XMLExportMap, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The XMLExportMap, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: XMLExportMap, Long Integer or String.

methods.name: firstItem
methods.description: Returns the first XMLExportMap in the collection.

methods.name: lastItem
methods.description: Returns the last XMLExportMap in the collection.

methods.name: middleItem
methods.description: Returns the middle XMLExportMap in the collection.

methods.name: previousItem
methods.description: Returns the XMLExportMap with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The index of the XMLExportMap that follows the desired XMLExportMap.

methods.name: nextItem
methods.description: Returns the XMLExportMap whose index follows the specified XMLExportMap in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The XMLExportMap whose index comes before the desired XMLExportMap.

methods.name: anyItem
methods.description: Returns any XMLExportMap in the collection.

methods.name: everyItem
methods.description: Returns every XMLExportMap in the collection.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the XMLExportMap.
Returns the XMLExportMap with the specified index.

description: A collection of XML export maps.
